info.name: FreeStickers
info.description: Enables you to send custom Stickers without nitro as links, (custom stickers as in the ones that are added by servers, not officiel discord stickers).

changelog.title: Added
items: Option to Highlight animated stickers and emojis.

defaultConfig.name: Sticker Size
defaultConfig.note: The size of the sticker in pixels. 160 is recommended.

defaultConfig.name: Send Directly
defaultConfig.note: Send the sticker link in a message directly instead of putting it in the chat box. Sticker sent as attachement will still be sent directly.

defaultConfig.name: Send animated stickers
defaultConfig.note: Animated stickers do not animate, sending them will only send the first picture of the animation. (still useful)

defaultConfig.name: Holding shift keeps stickers menu open
defaultConfig.note: This functionally has a great chancing of breaking due to other plugins overriding it.

settings.name: Enable Preview for stickers
settings.note: Enables a preview for stickers, Sometimes stickers tend to be small or has text that is unreadable

settings.name: Enables Preview for emojis
settings.note: Enables a preview for emojis, Emojis tend to be small or has text that is unreadable
